name: Roman Marianenko
position: React Front End Developer / React Native Developer
short-description: Hey, I am Roman Marianenko. I create accessible and responsive experiences for the web and mobile.

about.p1: I'm a developer who thrives on learning new skills and taking on challenges. I pride myself on being punctual and dependable, with the versatility to work seamlessly in a team or tackle tasks independently. I enjoy creating solutions that make an impact, and I’m always eager to grow both personally and professionally.
about.p2-1: Outside of work, I’m a big fan of games — whether it’s strategizing over a board game, diving into immersive worlds on my PC, or losing myself in a
about.p2-2: sprawling futuristic city full of neon lights and big dreams
about.p2-3: . These hobbies fuel my creativity and keep me inspired.
about.p3: I’m currently on the lookout for my next professional adventure and can’t wait to contribute my skills and passion to an innovative team. Let’s build something awesome together!

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.kpi-description: Solid academic background from the Faculty of Applied Math, with expertise in problem-solving, algorithm design and web-development.
timeline.ideathon-description: Achieved victory at the Smart City Ideathon, showcasing innovative problem-solving and teamwork skills.
timeline.binary-studio-academy-description: Gained extensive knowledge in both Front-End and Back-End development.
timeline.binary-studio-description: Gained first commercial experience by contributing to the development of a mobile application, focusing on implementing and optimizing major features and creating a construction management application from scratch.
timeline.computools-description: Provided support and feature enhancements for a mobile beauty app and a TikTok-style application. Also contributed to development of a music web application from scratch.
